alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 2:00PM EDT until July 29 at 2:50AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River near Salyersville affecting Magoffin County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Licking River near Salyersville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:15 PM EDT Thursday was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.6 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.5 feet on 08/05/1947. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 7 PM EDT.
